user_data.target_needs: I was primarily seeking comfort and support in a wireless bra, aiming for a product that would feel good to wear throughout the day.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable and lightweight option that would provide some support without the discomfort of traditional bras. The product's description highlighted its soft fabric and flexible support, which appealed to my desire for comfort. However, upon trying it, I found that it did not meet my expectations for support, as it felt loose and the band rolled up.

I wanted a wireless bra that offered both comfort and coverage. The description mentioned features like moisture-wicking fabric and a stay-in-place band, which I thought would enhance my experience. However, the fit was disappointing, and I realized that I may have needed a larger size, leading to my decision to return it.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer a good fit, comfort, and quality materials. I appreciate lightweight fabrics that are breathable and suitable for all-day wear, as seen in my positive experiences with shorts and leggings. I also value items that provide good value for money, especially when they are versatile and practical for everyday use. On the other hand, I tend to dislike products that have inconsistent sizing, poor quality materials, or lack adequate support, as these issues lead to dissatisfaction and the need for returns. Overall, I look for items that combine comfort, style, and reliability.

conversation.content: I want to find a wireless bra that offers both comfort and support for all-day wear. within my expected price range: [15.0, 16.1]

Here are some items that you might like:

Now you can, with this ladies' Mid weight tank top. Wear it as part of a layered outfit or on its own. Either way you'll get a sporty look paired with the comfort of ultra-soft cotton in 100% ring spun yarns."]

Item No.3 : Item Title: <Rosette Women’s Sleeveless Undershirt - Cotton – High Neck, Full shoulder design> / Item ID: B07BTSGMCV / Price: $11.98 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Tops Tees & Blouses', 'Tanks & Camis'] / Description: ['From the cradle to the coffin, underwear comes first!', 'As underwear is hidden beneath clothing, it is easy to believe that it does not require much forethought and that anything will do. But that is untrue, you not only need something that looks nice, but more importantly something that offers ultimate comfort.Your underwear should feel good and not distract from activity your taking part in.', 'GENERAL FEATURES:', 'Made of 100% Extra fine durable, soft Cotton for superior comfort Classic fit, perfect for layering Available in many sizes & colors (Check size chart above) Full shoulder design for a conservative appearance High neckline for a Modest Coverage Machine wash warm. Tumble dry low', 'Comfort + Quality + Style', "The Rosette Sleeveless Tank Top Undershirt is a must-have in any women's closet. The extra soft cotton material allows for all day wear during any type of activity, whether you're at the office or at home.Full shouldered tank straps conceal bra straps for a more put together look. With high neckline, great for anyone looking for extended coverage. They are very stretchy with a Nice ribbon trim around the neck and arms.", 'Natural Cotton – Eco-Friendly', 'Ideal for women with Sensitive skin and Sensory issues. Great for Sleeping, Lounging, Pajamas and Just for layering, or plain wearing clean finish bottom to wear tucked in or tucked out with the everyday essentials.', 'Get it, Feel it, Prove it!', 'Get the Rosette’s top rated tank shirt for ladies and girls today by clicking “Add to Cart” on top of the page and feel the difference.']
I would need more information about the wireless bras before making a decision. Can you provide me with some options in the lingerie category?

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <JUST MY SIZE Womens Wireless Bra, Comfort Shaping Full Figure Wire-Free Bra> / Item ID: B0BLN29R4S / Price: $14.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['This Just My Size Comfort Shaping Wirefree Bra is so pretty with its faux "diamond" metallic embellishment and sheer mesh trim you might buy it just for its looks. But it’s the comfy fabric rings that shape and lift your bust – without any wire - that you will learn to love in this wireless bra. Supportive patterned cups, fully adjustable straps, and a plush comfort wirefree band comfortably contour your curves. A stretch mesh neckline provides breathability and a feminine touch in what just may become your go-to wireless bra. Make this a bra that fits you perfectly with the help of three to four rows - depending on the size of the bra - of adjustable hooks and eyes at the back.'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Just My Size Wireless Sports Bra (With Pack Options), Best T-Shirt Seamless Bra, Wirefree Comfort Flex Lace Bra> / Item ID: B08V834LKN / Price: $12.96 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["This lace-trimmed wireless sports bra for large busts is made from flexible 93% nylon/7% spandex with 4-way stretch that adjusts to your curves, not the other way around. Knit-in support provides extra shaping, while a comfort band stays in place for everyday support. It's as stylish as it is comfortable, too: Soft floral lace gives it that sexy yet elegant look you love."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's X-Temp Wireless Bra with Cooling Mesh, Full-Coverage, Convertible T-Shirt Bra> / Item ID: B0B1SF6DQ4 / Price: $15.26 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Here's a wireless bra from Hanes that really does it all. At the heart of this ultra-comfortable wirefree bra is Hanes X-Temp™ technology, a remarkable bit of engineering that is designed to help keep you cool and dry for all day comfort. Another important design element is ComfortFlex Fit® fabric that stretches effortlessly to mold to your shape, unlike bras that force you to adapt to a restrictive construction. Superb support comes from lightly lined foam cups that offer natural lift and shaping, as well as a no-dig, stay-in-place under band. When it comes to coverage, this wirefree, full-coverage bra provides the coverage you want, detailed with sporty mesh inserts. You'll also appreciate the smooth cups that make this cooling wireless bra a perfect T-shirt bra. One more design detail is the convertible straps that offer two ways to wear for fashion flexibility."]
